list_definition.definition: the last words of another actor’s speech etc, serving as a sign to an actor to speak etc

list_ex_of_definition.ex_of_definition: Your cue is ‘– whatever the vicar says!’

list_definition.definition: a stick which gets thinner towards one end and the point of which is used to strike the ball in playing billiards.
